sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set 'problem_task.closed.can_reassess_on_closed_problem' property to true for upgrade instances.</description>
        <name>Set reassess on ptask property to true</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	if (GlidePluginManager.isZboot())
		return;
	var prevWF = gs.getSession().getWorkflow();
	try {
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(true);
		gs.setProperty('problem_task.closed.can_reassess_on_closed_problem', true);
	}
	finally{
		gs.getSession().setWorkflow(prevWF);
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-24 11:12:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b90ef4ef534a3010527dddeeff7b12c6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set reassess on ptask property to true</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid - State Model" source="com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid.state_model">002bb0a03c35311068bcf327dfe37f08</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b90ef4ef534a3010527dddeeff7b12c6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-11-08 10:47:57</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set reassess on ptask property to true
